name: setget
description:
This script automatically inserts setter, getter or both for php files.
Just type instance variable then :call PHP_setget() and choose from list if you want
setter, getter or both.

- if you have any suggestions, bugs etc. drop me an email (it&#039s in the file)
- I'd like to add more files, not just php, later
install_details: Just drop the file in the plugin directory.
